attributes.title: Porcentaje de logs por nivel
attributes.visState: {"title": "Porcentaje de logs por nivel", "type": "pie", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "params": {}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "severity_text", "orderBy": "1", "order": "desc", "size": 5}, "schema": "segment"}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right", "isDonut": true}}

attributes.title: Logs por servicio
attributes.visState: {"title": "Logs por servicio", "type": "horizontal_bar", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "params": {}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "resource.attributes.service.name", "orderBy": "1", "order": "desc", "size": 5}, "schema": "segment"}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right", "isDonut": false}}

attributes.title: Errores y advertencias en el tiempo
attributes.visState: {"title": "Errores y advertencias en el tiempo", "type": "line", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "filters", "schema": "group", "params": {"filters": [{"input": {"query": "severity_text: \"ERROR\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "ERROR"}, {"input": {"query": "severity_text: \"WARNING\" or severity_text: \"WARN\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "WARNING/WARN"}]}}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "date_histogram", "schema": "segment", "params": {"field": "@timestamp", "interval": "auto"}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right"}}

attributes.title: Últimos logs detallados
attributes.visState: {"title": "\u00daltimos logs detallados", "type": "table", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "severity_text", "size": 5}, "schema": "bucket"}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "resource.attributes.service.name", "size": 5}, "schema": "bucket"}, {"id": "4", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "body.text", "size": 5}, "schema": "bucket"}, {"id": "5", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "scope.name", "size": 5}, "schema": "bucket"}, {"id": "6", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "attributes.action", "size": 5}, "schema": "bucket"}, {"id": "7", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "resource.attributes.app", "size": 5}, "schema": "bucket"}, {"id": "8", "enabled": true, "type": "date_histogram", "params": {"field": "@timestamp", "interval": "auto"}, "schema": "bucket"}], "params": {"perPage": 10, "showPartialRows": true, "showMeticsAtAllLevels": false, "sort": {"columnIndex": null, "direction": "desc"}}}
